channel.title: Upcoming OECD Publication Embargoes and Launches
channel.description: A list of dates and publications

item.title: Global Forum on Transparency and Exchange of Information for Tax Purposes: Aruba 2018 (Second Round) - Peer Review Report on the Exchange of Information on Request
item.description: Global Forum on Transparency and Exchange of Information for Tax Purposes: Aruba 2018 (Second Round) - Peer Review Report on the Exchange of Information on Request by Centre for Tax Policy and Administration has an embargo on Wednesday, 17 October 2018, 12:00 Paris time (GMT+02:00).

item.description: Integrity for Good Governance in Latin America and the Caribbean - From Commitments to Action by General Secretariat has an embargo on Thursday, 18 October 2018, 9:00 Paris time (GMT+02:00).

item.description: China’s Progress Towards Green Growth - An International Perspective by Environment Directorate has an embargo on Friday, 19 October 2018, 6:00 Paris time (GMT+02:00).
